title: How We Measure
description: Through the cleverly written text, students learn the difference between the measurement systems of the United States and Canada. Pen pals Lisa and Magda illustrate height, weight, temperature, capacity, and distance in both metric and English units.
meta: distance, English, height, measure, metric, system, temperature, weighs
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Types of Sentences : Recognize different types of sentences
Measurement Words : Understand the use of measurement words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
